title: LOL are you JOKING???
body:
Teemo


Camouflage (Passive)  [ Text changed:]
"If Teemo stands still for 1.5 seconds, he becomes stealthed. 
**While in brush: Teemo sets up his camouflage twice as fast and can move around without breaking his stealth. **
Upon breaking camouflage by attacking or moving, Teemo gains the Element of Surprise, increasing his attack speed by X% for 3 seconds."
